description:
----Introductory Price ONLY - Increasing to $297 Soon---

$3,152 in profits from 1 day. $5,353 from another. $179,712 in affiliate commissions in just 7 months. That's on average $25,673 of affiliate commissions per month and those are just some of our results.

What is affiliate marketing?

It's simply building an audience online such as a list of email addresses or a fan base on Facebook and then promoting targeted offers that you don't even have to create to your audience and collecting commissions that are automatically deposited into your PayPal or bank account.

Guarantee: By the end of this course you'll be able to create affiliate campaigns that result in affiliate commissions of $500 to $1,000+.

You'll learn how to create affiliate campaigns from scratch even if you currently don't have an audience or a list and the best part is you don't even need your own products to make money with affiliate marketing.

We've sold over $2 million dollars of products just in the past 7 months and leveraging affiliate marketing was a huge component of that.

We'll unmask the cold hard truth behind how 6-figure and 7-figure online marketers make the real cash and it's not what you think plus we'll show you an under-the-hood look of our business teaching you:

-How we've built an asset of over 30,000 email addresses in the past 3.5 years

-How to promote via the "daily deal" method potentially achieving consistent $5,000 days

-How to leverage targeted bonuses & webinars to add $1,000's to your bottom line on a daily basis

By the end of the course you'll have completed your first affiliate promo generating you commissions.

Plus you'll get 3 bonusesâ€¦

-Bonus #1: Our Successful Promo Due Diligence Checklist to maximize your commissions

-Bonus #2: Our copy & paste Affiliate Promo Video Sales Script used to generate over $170 thousand just this year

-Bonus #3: Our very own Optimize Press Bonus Page used to generate $42,063 in commissions for affiliates

The Better than Money Back Guarantee

We're giving you a double your money back guarantee. Take action, get in our Private Facebook mastermind and if you don't succeed I'm going to give you double the money out of my own pocket for investing your time into our course.

Special Introductory Price - Rising Soon

Even though we've done over $4 million in sales ($1 million+ in the past 4.5 months alone) and we normally charge $697 and $997 for our life changing courses, we will keep this introductory price before raising it as a special for the Udemy community.

Take Action & Enroll

Enroll now, make the commitment and jump straight into the course right now. I know this course will revolutionize the way you do business online.

See you on the inside and check out the preview videos to see what value you'll be getting!

Talk soon,

Eric
title: Affiliate Marketing Alchemy: Affiliate Business Blueprint
